## isJsonPrimitive() function

Test if an `unknown` is a [JsonValue](./ts-json-base.jsonvalue.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isJsonPrimitive(from: unknown): from is JsonPrimitive;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  from | unknown | The <code>unknown</code> to be tested |

**Returns:**

from is [JsonPrimitive](./ts-json-base.jsonprimitive.md)

`true` if the supplied parameter is a valid [JsonPrimitive](./ts-json-base.jsonprimitive.md)<!-- -->, `false` otherwise.
